
== mx53 CCM ==

功率门控(Power Gating)
http://www.srvee.com/analog/apply/jypower_gatingdccqdghjsyj_59557.html

相比于时钟门控(Clock Gating)， 它不仅可以实时调节各个模块的运行频率、电压，
还能在不需要的时候彻底 关闭，实现部分零功耗。换句话说，Llano APU的每个处理
器核心、每个PCI-E控制器、 流处理器阵列、UVD3引擎都是可以完全关闭的。

mx53 有3种电源模式： RUN, WAIT, STOP

RUN:
	ARM run in its normal mode.
	The frequence and voltage can be changed by DVFS operation.
	Clocks to blocks can be gated by configuring the corresponding CCM_CCGRn register bits.
	
WAIT:
	ARM clock is gated.
	All other clocks are functional and can be gated by programming their CCGR bits.
	
STOP:
	All system clocks and DPLLs are stopped.
	
== Linux Power Managment ==

Linux has two power mode: "standby", "mem"
Android add one mode more to Linux: "on"

与mx53平台对应，有：

on 	- RUN
standby - WAIT 不降电压，CKIH开，内部时钟继续工作，ARM 时钟停止，系统内容存于iram 
mem 	- STOP 降低电压，关闭外部CKIH时钟，停止内部所有时钟，整个系统只有CKIL时钟在工作

耗电量： on > standby > mem
返回到on的时间： standby < mem
